mapper.sql: PERSONNEL_ID, USER_ID, PSN_NAME, PSN_CODE, NC_CODE, PSN_NBR, NATIONALITY, GENDER, NATION, MARRIAGE, PLITICAL_STATUS, IMAGE, REASON, TO_WORK_TIME, SERVING_AGE, LENGTH_SERVICE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE, UUID, NOTES
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PERSONNEL SET STATUS_CD = 1100 WHERE personnel_id = #{personnelId}
mapper.select:
select t1.personnel_id, t1.psn_name, t1.psn_code, t2.content mobile_phone, t3.content email, t4.cert_type, t4.cert_no from tb_personnel t1 left join tb_contact t2 on t1.personnel_id = t2.personnel_id and t2.contact_type = '1' and t2.first_flag = 1 and t2.status_cd = 1000 left join tb_contact t3 on t1.personnel_id = t3.personnel_id and t3.contact_type = '2' and t3.status_cd = 1000 left join tb_cert t4 on t1.personnel_id = t4.personnel_id and t4.status_cd = 1000 where t1.status_cd = 1000
and t1.personnel_id = #{personnelId}

select t1.personnel_id, t1.psn_name, t1.psn_nbr, t1.gender, t2.content, t1.create_date, t3.cert_no from tb_personnel t1, tb_contact t2, tb_cert t3 where t1.status_cd = 1000 and t2.status_cd = 1000 and t3.status_cd = 1000 and t1.personnel_id = t2.personnel_id and t1.personnel_id = t3.personnel_id and t2.contact_type = '1' and t2.first_flag = 1
and (t1.psn_name like '%'||#{psnBasicInfoVo.keyWord}||'%' or t1.psn_code like '%'||#{psnBasicInfoVo.keyWord}||'%' or t2.content like '%'||#{psnBasicInfoVo.keyWord}||'%' or t3.cert_no like '%'||#{psnBasicInfoVo.keyWord}||'%')

select count(1) from tb_acct t where t.status_cd = 1000
and t.personnel_id = #{personnelId}

select d.* from (select a.*, b.cert_no, c.content as mobile from (select t.personnel_id, t.psn_name, t.psn_nbr, t.create_date, t.status_cd from tb_personnel t where t.status_cd = 1000 and not exists (select t1.personnel_id from tb_org_person_rel t1 where t1.status_cd = 1000 and t1.personnel_id = t.personnel_id)) a left join tb_cert b on a.personnel_id = b.personnel_id and b.status_cd = 1000 left join tb_contact c on a.personnel_id = c.personnel_id and c.status_cd = 1000 and c.contact_type = '1' and c.first_flag = 1) d
where d.psn_name like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' or d.psn_nbr like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' or d.cert_no like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' or d.mobile like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'

SELECT v.UNICODE, v.USERNAME, v.CTIDENTITYNUMBER as certNo, v.CTPREFERREDMOBILE as mobile, v.CTOU, v.DEL_STATUS FROM octopus.V_UOMGRP_USER_ORG_INFO v where v.DEL_STATUS = 1000
and v.CTIDENTITYNUMBER = #{certNo}
